["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debianubuntu-用户","children":"Debian/Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["再选择你的 Debian/Ubuntu 版本，文本框中内容写进 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/mysql-community.list"}]]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/mysql-community.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 12",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11",{"os_name":"debian","release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"jammy"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"bionic"}],["Ubuntu 16.04 LTS",{"os_name":"ubuntu","release_name":"xenial"}]]},{"title":"MySQL 版本号","items":[["8.0",{"version":"8.0"}],["5.7",{"version":"5.7"}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/apt/{{os_name}} {{release_name}} mysql-{{version}} mysql-tools","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["参考文档：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-apt-repo-quick-guide/en/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-apt-repo-quick-guide/en/"}]]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rhelcentos-用户","children":"RHEL/CentOS 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/mysql-community.repo"}],"，内容如下："]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"mysql-8.0"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"mysql-connectors"}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"mysql-tools"}]," 在 RHEL 7/8 上还提供了 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"aarch64"}]," 版本。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"注：TUNA / BFSU 等镜像站不提供 CentOS 8 与 CentOS 6 版本"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/mysql-community.repo","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["CentOS/RHEL 7",{"release_name":"el7"}],["CentOS/RHEL 8",{"release_name":"el8"}]]},{"title":"MySQL 版本号","items":[["8.0",{"version":"8.0"}],["5.7",{"version":"5.7"}]]}],"code":"[mysql-connectors-community]
name=MySQL Connectors Community
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/yum/mysql-connectors-community-{{release_name}}-$basearch/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://repo.mysql.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-mysql
       https://repo.mysql.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-mysql-2022

[mysql-tools-community]
name=MySQL Tools Community
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/yum/mysql-tools-community-{{release_name}}-$basearch/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://repo.mysql.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-mysql
       https://repo.mysql.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-mysql-2022

[mysql-{{version}}-community]
name=MySQL {{version}} Community Server
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/yum/mysql-{{version}}-community-{{release_name}}-$basearch/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://repo.mysql.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-mysql
       https://repo.mysql.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-mysql-2022","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["参考文档：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-yum-repo-quick-guide/en/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-yum-repo-quick-guide/en/"}]]}]]}]

meta.title: MySQL 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
